title: Train Fault Causing Delay on East West Line at Aljunied Station

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: No train service from #Bugis to #TanahMerah towards #PasirRis due to a train fault at #Aljunied until the end of train service. We are sorry that your journey this evening has been affected.
[EWL] UPDATE: No train svc from #Bugis to #TanahMerah towards #PasirRis due to a train fault at #Aljunied.
[EWL]:Due to a train fault,pls add one hour train travel time from #TiongBahru to #PasirRis.Not linked to new signalling project.
